meanings.definition: Modify or create according to individual or personal specifications.
meanings.sent1: I customise my phone case with stickers to make it unique.
meanings.sent2: She likes to customise her clothes by adding patches and embroidery.
meanings.sent3: Why not customise your lunchbox with fun colors and patterns?
meanings.sent4: His ability to customise solutions for each client sets him apart in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The artist customises each painting to reflect the buyer's personality.

meanings.definition: Adapt or tailor to suit individual needs or preferences.
meanings.sent1: They customise the training program to fit the needs of each employee.
meanings.sent2: He decided to customise his workspace for better productivity.
meanings.sent3: I customise my morning routine to match my mood each day.
meanings.sent4: She can customise any recipe to accommodate dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent5: Customising your approach can lead to more successful outcomes.
